meanings.definition: Hold royal office; rule as king or queen.
meanings.sent1: The king will reign over the kingdom with wisdom and kindness.
meanings.sent2: She hopes to reign as the champion of the tournament.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actors pretended to reign over a magical land.
meanings.sent4: In her heart, she let love reign supreme above all else.
meanings.sent5: The sun will reign over the sky, bringing warmth and light to all.

meanings.definition: Be the best or most important in a particular area or domain.
meanings.sent1: His talent for singing will reign supreme in the competition.
meanings.sent2: The red rose will reign as the most beautiful flower in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The cat believes it will reign as the ruler of the house.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, comfort reigns over style for her.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song will reign in the hearts of the listeners forever.

meanings.definition: A period during which a monarch rules.
meanings.sent1: The reign of the queen brought prosperity to the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: During the reign of the emperor, the empire expanded its borders.
meanings.sent3: The reign of the clown at the party brought laughter and joy to all.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of history, the reign of the pharaohs remains legendary.
meanings.sent5: The reign of winter covers the land in a blanket of snow and ice.
